Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at a premium yet competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
